text: Koma pamene mavuto akhazikika pa munthu, iye amapempha Ambuye wake pafupipafupi koma munthuyo akalandira chisomo chochokera kwa Ambuye wake iye amaiwala zimene amalilira poyamba ndipo amakhazikitsa opikisana ndi Mulungu ndi cholinga chosokoneza anthu ku njira yoyenera ya Mulungu. Nena “Basangalalani ndi kusakhulupirira kwanu kwa kanthawi kochepa. Ndithudi inu ndinu okakhala ku moto!”
